ebm.MixingSection: Mixing area should be neat and clean
Ingredients of Previous products should be separated from current ones
All crumb bags of previous products must be removed
Mixer/mixer bowl should be free from rust and foreign matter
Mixer/mixer bowl should be free from previous product residue/smell
All utensils, pots buckets and material pallets must be free from previous residue
Sugar bags/sugar bags collection trolley should be cleaned and free from previous residue
Scissor lifter should be clean and free from all residue
Dough shooting hopper should be clean and free from residue

Cutting_Section.CuttingSection: Dough shooting conveyor should be free from previous produts residue/damages/web threads
Molder/cutter/sheeter/rolls should be free from previous products residues
All interlinked conveyors should be free from previous product residues/damages/web threads
Sprinkler unit should be free from previous product residues
Egg wash unit/brush/cloth should be cleaned and free from damages
Left over dough trays/S.S trays should be cleaned before starting new product
Scrape dough trolley should be removed and washed before using for new product
Dough crumbling device (if any) should be free from previous product residue
Molder (after disassembling) and its knife should be cleaned
All interlinked scrap knifes should be cleaned
Sprinkling and egg wash unit should be removed in case of plain products like Gluco and Marie
Swivel panner controlling device should be cleaned
Cutting unit platforms should be cleaned and free from residue (after complete changeover)
Floor cleaning should done after complete changeover and before start of new product

Over_Section.Ovensection: Oil spraying mesh should be cleaned after saltish products
Take off mesh should not hanve any residue  of previous product
Buckets should be empitied and cleaned at product change over
Cooling conveyer should be cleaned and free from previous product residue (in Buter zone).

Packing_Section.PackingSection: All packing  conveyors/packing machines should be free  from previous produts residue
Feeding chains should be cleaned properly through air pressure
All crumb bags/chanti/Machines wastage should be removed and Back log trays must be clear
S.S trolley at the end of conveyor should be emptied & cleaned
All crumb bags/Chanti/Machine wastage should be removed
Back log trays should be cleaned before start of new product
Floor Cleaning should done after somplete changeover and before start of new product
